WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

please see the following command sequence:

[zzz Pear]# pear install PHPExcel-1.7.9.tgz 
Unknown channel "pear.pearplex.net"
Parsing of package.xml from file "/var/tmp/pearmdJFmW/package.xml" failed
install failed
[zzz Pear]# php --version
PHP 5.3.3 (cli) (built: Jul 12 2013 04:36:18) 
Copyright (c) 1997-2010 The PHP Group
Zend Engine v2.3.0, Copyright (c) 1998-2010 Zend Technologies
[root@oc8305448625 Pear]# uname -a
Linux zzz 2.6.32-358.11.1.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed May 15 10:48:38 EDT 2013 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Is there a package that works with PHP 5.3.3 on Linux?

Thanks,
Guus

Comments.Message: If the pear install fails, why not simply install from one of the source download packages?

If the pear install fails, why not simply fix the bug?
I used a source package in the meantime...
Because I have several hundred bugs to identify and fix, and a bug that prevents installing via pear when there's a workround is very low priority
